bibl.seg: GOEHRING James E., The Provenance of the Nag Hammadi Codices Once More.

M.F. WILES and E.J. YARNOLD (Edd.), with the assistance of P.M. PARVIS, Papers Presented at the Thirteenth International Conference on Patristic Studies Held in Oxford 1999. Ascetica, gnostica, liturgica, orientalia = Studia Patristica. 35 (Leuven, 2001) pp. 234-253.
